parameters.name: AnnotationViewName
parameters.description: Name of annotation view in which to show this annotation (see Remarks )

title: IAnnotation.CanShowInAnnotationView
description: Gets whether this annotation can be shown in the specified annotation view.

parameters.name: AnnotationViewName
parameters.description: Name of annotation view in which to show this annotation (see Remarks )

returns: True if this annotation can be shown in the specified annotation view, false if not
remarks:
Use
IFeature::Name
to get the name of the annotation view. See the examples for details.
